attributes.action: Call for the London Olympic committee to scrap and change the ridiculous logo unveiled for the London 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A new logo has been unveiled for the London 2012 Olympics. Many feel it is an embarrassment and portrays our country in the worst possible way.

We petition for the Logo to be changed

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
